content:
The enemy attack on Khmelnitsky is the victims and victims of the civilian population, damaged infrastructure.

About thisreportedMayor of Khmelnitsky Alexander Simchyshyn.

“A terrible morning. We have damage to infrastructure. Damage to residential buildings. There are victims and victims among civilians. Details later, ”the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, RussiaShe has done12 rocket strokes in Zaporozhye, attacked energy objectsSumy regionand Kharkiv region.

In the Lviv region happenedThe drilling of droneinto the object of energy infrastructure.
title: In Khmelnitsky, there is a dead rocket stroke of the Russian Federation, infrastructure damaged
